EmailTemplate.subject: In the Know: Aloha APIs & More
EmailTemplate.textOnly: In The Know Want to stay “in the know” on NCR’s solution portfolio, roadmaps and upcoming new capabilities? Then this virtual event series is just for you. Below are our upcoming sessions: Restaurant Management: Reporting, Scheduling, Labor & Inventory Date: August 24, 2022 at 2:00 – 3:00 PM ET Join us for an update on our new cloud-based back office solution that will provide a single solution experience for reporting, labor, inventory and scheduling, including a demo of the progress made so far. Using machine learning, this solution will drive less hands-on tasks for managers and more predictive smart decisions. Restaurant Operations: Aloha APIs & Services Date: August 31, 2022 at 2:00 – 3:00 PM ET Join Kate Bae, vice president of partner marketplace and API platforms, for an informative session on current Aloha APIs, their use cases and what’s next on the roadmap. Restaurant Operations: Aloha Upgrade Tools Date: September 14, 2022 at 2:00 – 3:00 PM ET Join us for an overview of the Aloha Upgrades solution architecture, a side-by-side comparison of what is available and what’s coming, and a demo of key features. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
